Table 1: Results on AMR-to-text generation for the 
LDC2017T10 test set. M and BT stand for METEOR 
and BLEURT, respectively. Bold (Italic) indicates the 
best score without (with) task-adaptive pretraining.
Table 2: Results on WebNLG. A, S and U stand for all, seen, and unseen partitions of the test set, respectively.

Table 3: Results on AGENDA test set. Bold (Italic) 
indicates best scores without (with) task-adaptive pre-
training.

Table 8: Effect (measured with BLEU score) of cross-
domain STA.

data. Note that AMR graphs contain a more complex structure than WebNLG and AGENDA graphs.
